Pre-Game Insights: Brazil is currently in 6th place in the Eliminatórias for the 2026 World Cup with 7 points, and Ecuador is one position above them with 8 points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be held at the Couto Pereira stadium in Curitiba, and will start at 22h (Brasília time). Globo, SporTV, and CNN Esportes will broadcast the match.
Others: This is the seventh round of the Eliminatórias, and Brazil has two victories, one draw, and three losses in six games. Ecuador has three victories, two draws, and one loss.
